PreceptDef.label: immortal
PreceptDef.description: The bond between tree and soul transcends death. Those dryads blessed by the sacred groves do not perish, they always return to the earth.

PreceptDef.label: high
PreceptDef.description: Dryads are not mere extensions of the tree. These sentient spirits choose their bonds, fight alongside kin, and endure beyond broken links — awaiting the reunion.

PreceptDef.label: nature attuned
PreceptDef.description: The Gauranlen’s spirit recognises all forms that come from nature, be it root, branch, timber, or rock.

PreceptDef.label: compromised pact
PreceptDef.description: The Gauranlen connection is compromised. The queen reached a pact with us to endure unnatural surroundings. With heavy hearts, we plant them in such terrible places for our little hope.
